model

Class ModelFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.ModelFacade
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IModel

    public final class ModelFacade
extends java.lang.Object
implements IModel

    The Class ModelFacade provides a facade of the Model component.

    1.0
    Author:
    Jean-Aymeric DIET jadiet@cesi.fr
